body_html: Any updates on this? While the patch works with the specific tf-commit (also with Python3), the tf version says version is 1.2.1-rc1, so rather old (that version was incompatible with current bazel 0.5.3, so bazel needs to be downgraded in order to build the tf-patch version.) The cudnn 7 changes so far are not included in HEAD. Any possibility for a branch that supports the most recent released upstream software/drivers?

body: Any updates on this? While the patch works with the specific tf-commit (also with Python3), the tf version says __version__ is 1.2.1-rc1, so rather old (that version was incompatible with current bazel 0.5.3, so bazel needs to be downgraded in order to build the tf-patch version.) The cudnn 7 changes so far are not included in HEAD. Any possibility for a branch that supports the most recent released upstream software/drivers?
